name: Boskov
description:
Game done during the Ludum Dare Jam 44 (Theme : Your life is currency), where you are a prison supervisor and you must maintain Vladimir Pouchkov awake, eventually alive, otherwise he won't give you the needed information he knows. Your weapons ? Coffee, a bucket filled with water, your own voice to yell at him and other crazy stuffs you'll discover during the game. Good luck !

To be able to play, you need a mic and a Xbox controller.

Controls : - Mic = Yell at Vladimir

- Button A = Smash / Calm down Vladimir

- Button B = Press / Give him coffee

- Button X = Press / Drop water on him

- Trigger LT = Press / Put on some music

- Trigger RT = Maintain / Activate the microphone

- Left Joystick = Rotate / Recharge the battery

Credits : Corto Pavie / Lucas Kauff / Kilian Allaire / Elie Sarfati / Maxence Droz
